title: Toyota 3800Lb Capacity Electric Forklift with Charger
item_description:
Toyota 3800Lb Capacity Electric Forklift with Charger

Note: Forklift has been reserved by Auctioneer and will be available for pickup by appointment only on Monday, July 28th, 2025 from 9:00 AM to 3:30 PM. This unit will be used during the removal period, therefore the hours below are an approximate guideline.

  • Manufacturer: Toyota
  • Model: 7FBH25
  • Load Capacity: 3800LB
  • Fuel Type: Electric
  • Mast Type: Three Stage
  • Hour Meter Reads: 7263
  • Serial Number: 26733
  • Overall Width: 44”
  • Overall Length: 135”
  • Overall Height: 82”
  • Tread Width: 7.5”
  • Tire Type: Solid Rubber
  • Number of Front Tires: 2
  • Front Tire Size: 21x8x9/6.00
  • Number of Rear Tires: 2
  • Rear Tire Size: 18x7-8
  • Maximum Lift Height: 185”
  • Fork Length: 42”
  • Condition: Used
  • Starts: Yes
